body: More feral than typical trolls, ragers are bloodthirsty maniacs in battle, known for tearing off and swallowing pieces of living opponents. These trolls are the most likely to overeat and devastate the food supply in an area.
name: Troll Ragers

sections.ac: 21, touch 11, flat-footed 18 (+4 armor, +1 deflection, +3 Dex, +6 natural, -2 rage, -1 size)
sections.special_attacks: rage (14 rounds/day), rage powers (superstition +2), rend (2 claws, 1d6+13)
sections.other_gear: chain shirt, amulet of natural armor +1, cloak of resistance +1, ring of protection +1, barbed troll claws*, 130 gp
sections.feats: Intimidating Prowess, Mighty Bite*, Raging Regeneration*, Weapon Focus (claw)
sections.senses: darkvision 60 ft., low-light vision, scent; Perception +11

sections.body:
Before Combat The brute drinks her potion and rages.

Base Statistics When she's not raging, the barbarian's statistics are

AC 23, touch 13, flat-footed 20

hp 109

Fort +17

Will +3; bite +12 (1d8+7), 2 claws +13 (1d6+7); rend (2 claws, 1d6+10)

Str 25

Con 27

CMB +14

CMD 28

Skills Intimidate +11.
sections.name: Tactics
Troll Brute

sections.ac: 20, touch 10, flat-footed 17 (+5 armor, +3 Dex, +5 natural, -2 rage, -1 size)
sections.special_attacks: rage (19 rounds/day), rage powers (increased damage reduction, superstition +3), rend (2 claws, 1d6+17)
sections.other_gear: +1 chain shirt, gauntlets of rending *, 50 gp
sections.feats: Great Rend*, Intimidating Prowess, Mighty Bite*, Raging Regeneration*, Weapon Focus (claw)
sections.senses: darkvision 60 ft., low-light vision, scent; Perception +12

sections.body:
Base Statistics When he's not raging, the barbarian's statistics are

AC 22, touch 12, flat-footed 19

hp 148

Fort +18

Will +3; bite +14 (1d8+7), 2 claws +15 (1d6+9); rend (2 claws, 1d6+14)

Str 25

Con 28

CMB +16

CMD 29

Skills Intimidate +16.
sections.name: Tactics
Troll Berserker
